Entries.fall_20: Hey @! Glad to see you!$h#$b#Later's the annual Ridgeside Gathering and I was wondering..#$b#Would you like to perform in the concert along with the others? I'll only ask once okay?$4#$q 75161001/75161002 ridgesideperform_question#Would you like to perform in the concert later?#$r 75161001 0 ridgesideperform_yes#Sure, I would love to!#$r 75161002 0 ridgesideperform_no#Oh, sorry, I'll just watch.
Entries.ridgesideperform_yes: You will?! Great! I can't wait!$h
Entries.ridgesideperform_no: Really huh? Well that's too bad.$4
Entries.ridgesideperform_question: $p 75161001#Oh! I'm excited to see you all perform! Goodluck!$h|Oh well, It would have been much more fun to have more performers. Sing and dance your heart out!?$h
